IFileService.createDir: fn(path: string, directory: string, replace?: bool) -> ?
IFileService.createFile: fn(path: string, file: string, replace?: bool) -> ?
IFileService.writeFile: fn(path: string, file: string, text: string, Blob: ?, replace?: bool) -> ?
IFileService.writeExistingFile: fn(path: string, file: string, text: string, Blob: ?) -> ?
IFileService.moveDir: fn(path: string, directory: string, newPath: string, newDirectory?: string) -> ?
IFileService.moveFile: fn(path: string, file: string, newPath: string, newFile?: string) -> ?
IFileService.copyDir: fn(path: string, directory: string, newPath: string, newDirectory?: string) -> ?
IFileService.copyFile: fn(path: string, file: string, newPath: string, newFile?: string) -> ?

IFilePromise.then: fn(successCallback: fn(promiseValue: T), TResult: ?, errorCallback?: fn(error: IFileError), TResult: ?) -> ?
